enchantment.apothic_spawners.capturing.d: Makes mobs have a chance to drop their spawn egg.
misc.apothic_spawners.min_value: This modifier cannot reduce this below %s
misc.apothic_spawners.max_value: This modifier cannot increase this above %s
misc.apothic_spawners.banned: Cannot be used on a Spawner
stat.apothic_spawners.min_delay.desc: The minimum number of ticks between spawns
stat.apothic_spawners.max_delay.desc: The maximum number of ticks between spawns
stat.apothic_spawners.spawn_count.desc: The number of entities spawned at once
stat.apothic_spawners.max_nearby_entitie: The total number of entities allowed nearby
stat.apothic_spawners.req_player_range.d: How far a player can be before spawning stops
stat.apothic_spawners.spawn_range.desc: The radius (in blocks) that mobs can spawn in
stat.apothic_spawners.ignore_players.des: The spawner does not need a nearby player
stat.apothic_spawners.redstone_control.d: The spawner requires redstone to activate
stat.apothic_spawners.no_ai.desc: Spawned entities will have no AI
stat.apothic_spawners.silent.desc: Spawned entities will make no noise
stat.apothic_spawners.baby.desc: The spawner will always spawn a baby entity when possible
stat.apothic_spawners.initial_health.des: The initial health percentage of spawned mobs
info.apothic_spawners.spawner: Spawners may be modified with various items, and can be collected with %s.
info.apothic_spawners.spawner.no_silk: Spawners may be modified with various items, but collection with Silk Touch is currently disabled.
info.apothic_spawners.spawner.always_dro: Spawners may be modified with various items, and will always drop when broken.
info.apothic_spawners.capturing: The capturing enchantment gives monsters a chance to drop their spawn egg.\n \nDrop Rate: %s%% per level
advancements.apothic_spawners.spawner.ro: Spawners can be collected and modified, see JEI for info.
advancements.apothic_spawners.spawner.de: Collect a mob spawner using Silk Touch.
Get a spawn egg from a mob using the Capturing enchantment
advancements.apothic_spawners.modifier.d: Use a spawner modifier to change the stats of a spawner.
advancements.apothic_spawners.spawncount: Look at the Size of His Spawner!
Raise the spawn count of a spawner to 16
advancements.apothic_spawners.maxdelay.d: Decrease the maximum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.apothic_spawners.mindelay.d: Decrease the minimum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.apothic_spawners.nearbyents: Raise the max nearby entities of a spawner to 32
advancements.apothic_spawners.playerrang: Raise the player activation range of a spawner to 48
advancements.apothic_spawners.spawnrange: Raise the spawn range of a spawner to 32
advancements.apothic_spawners.conditions: Disable spawn conditions for a spawner
advancements.apothic_spawners.players.de: Disable the need for nearby players for a spawner
advancements.apothic_spawners.redstone.d: Enable redstone control for a spawner
advancements.apothic_spawners.light.desc: Make your spawner work in any light level.
advancements.apothic_spawners.noai.desc: Disable Mob AI for a spawner.
advancements.apothic_spawners.ultimate_s: Create a spawner with minimal delays that has redstone control, no AI, ignores spawn conditions, and ignores players.
